I've preordered the S23U in 2023 because I was promised a flagship device with 4 generations of OS updates. Seeing now that midrange phones from way smaller companies have gotten Android 15 for months now makes me realize that this is my last Samsung phone.

I bought my S24+, Watch 4 and Tab S9 last year. I was a loyal Fan of Samsung, but this greedy behavior to hold back the One UI 7 Update to push S25 sales is unacceptable. You promised 7 Years of update support for the customer. This is just scam... SHAME ON YOU!

They don't care about us, they treat us like dirt. A company that doesn't respect or appreciate its customers at all. Rather, it follows a policy of trade and profit and pushes them to buy its new devices only. As a Samsung 24Ultra user, I feel betrayed. Im living to google pixel
